short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improve your Twitch experience by filtering the Twitch chats. It will hide or blur the messages containing your ban words.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Twitch Ban Words is a Chrome extension designed to improve your Twitch experience by allowing you to filter the Twitch chats. Whether you're a streamer or a viewer, this tool empowers you to maintain a positive and enjoyable chat environment by hiding words or phrases you find disruptive or offensive.

üìù Customizable Ban List: 

Easily add words or phrases to your personalized ban list to filter out unwanted content from Twitch chats.

‚ö°Ô∏è Real-Time Filtering:

Enjoy real-time filtering as the extension automatically hides the specified words, ensuring a seamless viewing experience.

üëÄ Hide or Blur:

You have the choice to blur the message you don't want or simply hide it. When the messages are blur if you pass your mouse over it will show the content of the message.

üí° Lightweight and Efficient:

Minimal impact on browser performance, ensuring a smooth and uninterrupted Twitch experience.


Take control of your Twitch chats with Twitch Ban Words and create a more enjoyable, focused, and positive environment. Download now and start customizing your Twitch experience!
